====V0.0.005====
This [https://wiki.zaplink.googlecode.com/hg/ZAPLink%20Framework.V0.0.005.zip Version] was made the 2010-05-07.

Major changes :
  * Installer now allow to active all installed components
  * "Code Signature" and XML Checksum are now stable, after a fresh install on an other SAP System, theses MD5 hash no longer change
  * Transaction ZL_INFOS allow to provide an XML file listing SAP system configuration such as support package and ZAPLink components with code Signature. This XML Info file is now mandatory for every Issue report.
  * In case of framework broken you can use program ZAPLINK_INFOS_STANDALONE.  

  
  * Take a look to [http://code.google.com/p/zaplink/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ARelease-0.0.005%20label%3Atype-defect&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Release+Summary&x=priority&cells=tiles the corrected bug list] 
  * Take a look to [http://code.google.com/p/zaplink/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ARelease-0.0.005%20label%3Atype-enhancement&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Release+Summary&x=priority&cells=tiles the enhancement list]
  * Take a look to [http://code.google.com/p/zaplink/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ARelease-0.0.005%20label%3Atype-task&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Release+Summary&x=priority&cells=tiles the task list] 
  * Take a look to *[http://code.google.com/p/zaplink/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ADetected_on_Release-0.0.005%20label%3Atype-defect&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Detected_on_Release+Release+Summary&x=priority&cells=tiles the knowned bug list]*

=[https://wiki.zaplink.googlecode.com/hg/icon.png] ZAPLink *extensions* =
These extensions need a ZAPLink framework installed. Here is all Framework's extensions releases.
==ZIP File==
This extension allow to save XML content comptacted using ZIP.
Take a look to _[http://code.google.com/p/zaplink/source/browse/CLAS/CLAS.ZAPLINK_FILE_ZIP.xml CLAS.ZAPLINK_FILE_ZIP.xml]_.
===V0.0.000==
Data is *GZipped* before been writed to the disk. (before revision: 62e653bf2d). The file cannot be edited.
===V0.0.001==
Data is Zipped as a file before been writed to the disk. (revision: 62e653bf2d and after). The file is a normal ZIP file and can be extracted and then edited.
